TopicTitle: What happened to the Kerbal Network?

Articles.Content: Why is there only one page of threads? Where'd the old ones go?
I'm seeing over 16 pages of threads over here. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Are you sure it's not some moderator thingy? Because I only see one page too.

Same here, I'm only seeing one page, the last thread being this one: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109853-HTTP-403-Forbidden](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109853-HTTP-403-Forbidden)
![LAmpAM6.png](http://i.imgur.com/LAmpAM6.png)
1 page confirmed.
I only see 1 page as well.

> 
> I'm seeing over 16 pages of threads over here. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

You're all alone, Vexx.
Well either I've got some sort of mod powers or the problem is fixed.

> 
> Well either I've got some sort of mod powers or the problem is fixed.

Hmm... not fixed on my end.

I PM'd Kasper, maybe he can fix it.
I still only see 39 threads.
Adjust your thread display options at the bottom of the page, you're just seeing threads from the last month.

> 
> Adjust your thread display options at the bottom of the page, you're just seeing threads from the last month.

and why did that default to that for so many?

> 
> Adjust your thread display options at the bottom of the page, you're just seeing threads from the last month.

Well, damn, that's done it. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

I didn't set that myself, what gives?

EDIT:

It just reset itself to "Last Month" again! ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
No idea, I just noticed it myself as well.
Is that a new feature of some sort or am I just very unobservent.

It's only defaulting to "Last Month" in the Kerbal Network, nowhere else. Very strange.

Whenever I set it to "Beginning" and switch to a thread or out of the forum, it goes back to "Last Month".

I may have missed a "save" button, I'll check.

EDIT:

It's stopped now.
Kasper just fixed it, sorry for any inconvenience.
Yup, working now.
Wierd forum glitch then I guess.
I think it is just the remininats of the Green Iron Crown messing with the system. Alas, he is no more...

> 
> I think it is just the remininats of the Green Iron Crown messing with the system. Alas, he is no more...

*He shall rest forever in the Kerbal Network...*

Which is conveniently the most abandoned forum, and will now serve as our spooky graveyard.

Well, that was a weird one, for sure. Hmm. 

Oh well.
